name: Customer Agreements Report
query:
select
cus.first_name as "Customer Name::100",
cus.last_name as "Surname::100",
cus.prersonal_code as "Personal Code::100",
ca.name as "Agreement Number:Link/Customer Agreement:150",
ca.agreement_status as "Agreement Status::150",
ca.date as "Agreement Start Date::180",
ca.agreement_close_date as "Agreement Close Date::180",
ca.product_category as "Product category::150",
item.brand as "Product model::150",
format(ca.monthly_rental_payment,2) as "Rental Payment::150",
format(ca.agreement_period,2) as "Agreement Period::150",
format(ca.s90d_sac_price,2) as "90d SAC Price::170",
format(item.purchase_price_with_vat,2) as"Purchase price::150",
format((ca.s90d_sac_price - item.purchase_price_with_vat)/item.purchase_price_with_vat * 100,2) as "90d SAC profit %% ::180",
format((ca.monthly_rental_payment * ca.agreement_period -item.purchase_price_with_vat)/item.purchase_price_with_vat * 100,2) as "Planned agreement profit %% ::200",
format(ca.monthly_rental_payment * ca.agreement_period,2) as "Planned agreement incomes::200",
format(ca.payments_made,2) as "Real agreement incomes::200",
case when ca.agreement_status = "Closed" then ca.agreement_close_date
when ca.agreement_status = "Suspended" then ca.suspended_from
else "-" end as "Agreement closing/suspension date::230",
case when ca.agreement_closing_suspending_reason = "Early buy offer" then
concat(ca.early_buy_discount_percentage,"%% ",ca.agreement_closing_suspending_reason)
else ca.agreement_closing_suspending_reason end as "Agreement closing suspension reason::230",
ca.agreement_period - ca.payments_left as "Active agreement months::180",
format(ca.payments_made - item.purchase_price_with_vat,2) as "Real agreement profit (EUR)::180",
format((ca.payments_made - item.purchase_price_with_vat)/item.purchase_price_with_vat * 100,2) as "Real agreement profit %%::180",
format(ca.payments_left,2) as "Remaining months till the end of agreement:Int:250",
ca.campaign_discount_code as "Campaign discount code:Link/Campaign Discount Code:150"
from `tabCustomer Agreement` ca ,`tabCustomer` cus,`tabItem` item
where ca.customer = cus.name and ca.product = item.name
